affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

word_mean_info__list.difference: 口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。
普通用词，含义广。既可指某种具体的商业又可指广泛的贸易。
多指买卖双方通过谈判、协商就商品质量、数量、价格等项达成协议所成的生意。
多指大规模的买卖或易货关系。
指包括售货、购货、换货在内的综合商业活动，方式可以是批发或零售。
含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
用作“事情”解时，词义较笼统、含糊，多用于指不很具体的事。

bilingual.source: I hope to get a business degree and become a manager.
bilingual.target: 我希望获得商业学位并成为经理。

bilingual.source: He returned to Britain in 1931, where he worked in business.
bilingual.target: 他于1931年回到英国，在那里从事商业工作。

bilingual.source: One Christmas Eve, Scrooge sees the ghost of Jacob Marley, his dead business partner.
bilingual.target: 一个圣诞夜，斯克鲁奇看到了他的已故商业伙伴雅各布·马利的幽灵。

bilingual.source: We need a business partner to expand our business.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个商业伙伴来扩展业务。

bilingual.source: He prefers using com domains for his business ventures.
bilingual.target: 他更喜欢为他的商业项目使用商业域名。

bilingual.source: You need to have a business eye.

bilingual.target: 我们需要一个新的商业模式。
他们是长期的商业伙伴。
她的商业理解能力非常强。

list.abstract: business，英文单词，作名词，翻译为商业、交易、生意、事务、职业、行业等。

yingyinNormal.en: You will hear some details from our business later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 稍等，您将听到我们公司商业上经营的细节。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm busy, too. I have a business offer deal that is...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也有事，我有...商业上的项目，买卖，大买卖。

yingyinNormal.en: We are not getting a business loan! You tricked me into coming to the city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不许借商业贷款，你把我骗来市里。

yingyinNormal.en: But what about your "class reunion" where everybody brings a "business offer"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你那个需要带着商业项目参加的豪华同学聚会怎么办？

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Sexism in business? So what did you do for work, Ben, before you retired?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？商业中的性别歧视吗？所以你退休之前是做什么工作的？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, we'll just go in and while we're in here, well, I don't know, ask for a business loan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们就转一圈，不过既然都来了，要不就问问商业贷款吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Why, because of this totally out-of-the-blue order we got to do cupcakes for this business seminar?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么，是因为我们突然接到这商业座谈会的小蛋糕订单吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Being invited to give a business speech at this club hit me even more egregious because you couldn't claim that it was only social business that was done there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被邀请到这家俱乐部做商业演讲就更让人不爽了因为这根本就不是单纯的社交活动场所。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: From Hong Kong Island's central business district, take the half hour bus ride to the tranquil beaches of Shek O.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由香港岛的中心商业区，乘坐巴士到清静的石澳海滩只需半小时。

yingyinNormal.en: And also 'cause they're Jewish. I'm the one with the business degree, and you have to trust me on this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且也因为他们都是犹太人。我才是有商业学位的人，这事你得相信我。

yingyinNormal.en: Explore the malls and futuristic architecture of Hong Kong's main business district, Central.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在香港的主要商业区中环，您可以游走各大大小小的商场和富有未来感的建筑物。

yingyinNormal.en: Whoever threw that is not afraid to really go for it, and that will go a long way toward success in business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 扔球过来的那个人从心所愿，放胆去做能在商业道路上获得更长远的成功。

yingyinNormal.en: Raymond's not a politician. He relies on our political expertise as much as we rely on his business acumen.
yingyinNormal.zh: Raymond不是政客。他依赖我们的政治意见，正如我们依靠他的商业头脑。

yingyinNormal.en: And then one day she cornered the man who was installing the telephone here and that's how I got my first job in business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后有一天，她堵住来这里装电话的人，我就是那样得到了第一份商业工作。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You're right. You're the business genius. What do I know? Let's go get that loan. Thank you!
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实呢，你说得有道理，你才是商业天才，我懂个屁啊，咱们进去贷款吧。谢谢支持！

yingyinNormal.en: This modern business district, filled with light and art, is testimony that Paris is designed for living, even when at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个现代化的商业区充满了光明与艺术气息，证明巴黎人即使在工作中也不忘享受生活。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a business intervention. It's not an intervention. Max, your behavior lately has affected me in the following ways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来这是商业批斗会啊。这不是批斗会好吗，麦克斯，你最近的行为由以下几种方式影响了我。

yingyinNormal.en: It appears Decima Technology has been dismantled as a viable business entity, which makes me wonder, who exactly is getting the NSA feeds?
yingyinNormal.zh: 似乎德西玛科技已经解散不再是商业实体了，这让我很想知道，国安局的监控信号到底发给谁了？

yingyinNormal.en: Just a few months ago this year, a very well respected and well-known business executives in Silicon Valley, invited me to give a speech to his club on social media.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年，就在几个月前，硅谷一位很受尊敬的知名商业经理人邀请我到他的社交媒体俱乐部发表演讲。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I just need one page. Which page can we use? News, sports, fashion. Not the fashion page. OK, I'll use the business page.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只需要一张纸。哪页是我们不要的？新闻版，体育版，噢对了，时尚版。不要用我的时尚版。好吧，那我们就用商业版。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 商业; 交易; 行业

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 营业执照；业务许可；经营许可证

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 事业；职业；行业；交易；生意；商业；系列事件；表演；受欢迎的人；难题

sense_info_list.zh: 商业; 交易; 行业

examination_example.sentence: A Harvard <highlight>Business</highlight> School study found that observers consistently rated those who were upfront about themselves more highly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈佛商学院的一项研究发现，观察人士对那些坦率直言的人的评价始终更高。

examination_example.sentence: Retail trade groups praised the ruling, saying it levels the playing field for local and online <highlight>businesses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售贸易团体赞扬了这项裁决，称它为本地和在线交易提供了公平的竞争环境。

examination_example.sentence: This could add value to their <highlight>businesses</highlight> in three ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可以从三个方面为他们的业务增加价值。

examination_example.sentence: It has irritated private <highlight>business</highlight> owners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这激怒了私营企业主。

examination_example.sentence: If this doesn't change, American <highlight>businesses</highlight>, communities, and consumers will be the losers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这种情况不改变，美国企业、社区和消费者将成为输家。

examination_example.sentence: Its negative effects on <highlight>businesses</highlight> are often overlooked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它对企业的负面影响经常被忽视。

examination_example.sentence: Time can be evenly split for reading and <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读书和工作的时间可以平均分配。

examination_example.sentence: All the daily <highlight>business</highlight> has been promptly dealt with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有日常工作都得到了及时处理。

examination_example.sentence: It's a really hard thing to do and it's a tremendous luxury that BuzzFeed doesn't have a legacy <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这真的很难做到，而且BuzzFeed没有遗留工作是一种巨大的奢侈。

examination_example.sentence: Trust is a tricky <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信任是一件棘手的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes your primary <highlight>business</highlight> of the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读成为你一天的主要事情。

word_usage.usage:
表示“事情”时：
business指需要完成或讨论的重要事务，也指归某人管的事或某人持有某种看法的事情。
concern指关系到某人切身利益、引起其关注或担忧的重要事情。
matter通常指关乎利益、命运等的紧要事务，必须予以考虑或解决。
thing词义最为广泛，可指任何事实、事件、情况、行为等。

业务扩张；营业扩充；[经]经济高涨

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 事业；职业；行业；交易；生意；商业；系列事件；表演；受欢迎的人；难题

examination_example.sentence: I couldn't stay there any longer, their <highlight>business</highlight> practices threw me off the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不能再呆在那里了，他们的商业行为把我从屋顶上扔了下来。

examination_example.sentence: American families and prominent <highlight>business</highlight> leaders are aware that there's a big problem with automation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国家庭和杰出的商业领袖都意识到自动化存在一个大问题。

examination_example.sentence: Data on management expenses at the college system and in other state departments will be part of a "<highlight>business</highlight> justification".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学系统和其他州立部门的管理费用数据将成为“商业理由”的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: It's just one of a growing number of <highlight>businesses</highlight> committed to slowly changing the way America farms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它只是致力于缓慢改变美国农场的越来越多的业务之一。

examination_example.sentence: Young people might not otherwise be able to afford to break into the <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人可能无法负担得起开展业务。

examination_example.sentence: Kristin Die hl is a associate professor of marketing at the University of Southern California Marshall School of <highlight>Business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Kristin Diehl 是一位南加州大学马歇尔商学院营销学副教授。

examination_example.sentence: Both individuals and <highlight>businesses</highlight> post regularly to engage and interact with people from around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人和企业都定期发布帖子，与来自世界各地的人进行互动。

examination_example.sentence: Some <highlight>businesses</highlight> have begun to realize it may not be effective to let consumers take full responsibility for recycling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些企业已经意识到把回收利用以减少浪费的希望全都寄托在消费者身上并非有效之举。

examination_example.sentence: The remaining 20 percent of the Palau seas will be reserved for local fishing by individuals and small-scale commercial fishing <highlight>businesses</highlight> with limited exports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帕劳（Palau）海剩余的20％的面积将留给私人和出口有限的小型商业捕鱼企业在当地捕鱼。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

word_usage.usage: business由busy和ness组合而成，等同于busy的抽象名词。

business基本义指某人为谋利的“日常工作”或“职业”，引申可表示“职责/事务”。
go to business 上班
none of one's business 不关某人的事

business现在多指不可数名词“商业/生意/贸易”，引申为可数名词“商店/商行”。
go into business 从商
in business 经商
on business指“因事或因公出差”，也可说on a little business “因一件小事”，但不可说on a business。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义较广, 侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情, 也可指商事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
普通用词, 着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 事业；职业；行业；交易；生意；商业；系列事件；表演；受欢迎的人；难题

examination_example.sentence: This is where they conduct <highlight>business</highlight>, where a sense of community reinforces the culture and values of the gig economy (零工经济) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是他们开展业务的地方，在这里共享意识强化了零工经济的文化和价值观。

examination_example.sentence: Critics say the digital access codes represent the same profit-seeking ethos (观念) of the textbook <highlight>business</highlight>, and are even harder for students to opt out of.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批评家说，数字访问密码代表着与教科书行业相同的营利精神观念，甚至更难让学生选择退出。

examination_example.sentence: A company should find ways to innovate not just in products but also in functions, <highlight>business</highlight> models and processes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司不仅应该在产品方面，还应该在功能、商业模式和流程方面找到创新的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Just building a place as an "international <highlight>business</highlight> district" doesn't mean it will become one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅把一个地方当做“国际商务区”修建并不意味着它真的会成为国际商务区。

examination_example.sentence: The government built the bridge directly from the airport to the Songdo International <highlight>Business</highlight> District. And the surface infrastructure was built at the same time as the new airport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府直接在机场和松岛国际商务区之间架起了桥梁。地面基础设施是与新机场同时建立的。

examination_example.sentence: The idea, as he has put it, is to offer <highlight>businesses</highlight> "rapid, long-distance connectivity on a massive scale. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如其所言，这样做的目的是让各商业机构能“大规模地进行高速地远程连接”。

examination_example.sentence: Young families move here because the schools are great. And that's the problem: Songdo has become a popular Korean city—more popular as a residential area than a <highlight>business</highlight> one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻家庭搬到这里是因为这里的学校很好。这就是问题所在：松岛已经成为韩国的热门城市——更多的是作为住宅区受到欢迎，而不是作为商业区。

examination_example.sentence: For women seeking to climb to the highest levels of either politics or <highlight>business</highlight>, they have to do more than their male counterparts to prove themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于要想登上政界或商界最高层的女性来说，她们必须比男性付出更多来证明自己。

examination_example.sentence: We've surveyed <highlight>business</highlight> communication consultants and etiquette (礼仪) experts to come up with the following guidelines for effectively using the alternative ways of delivering difficult messages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从商务沟通顾问和礼仪专家那进行了研究以提出以下参考，以有效使用可选的方法传递困难的消息。

examination_example.sentence: The signs do nothing more than identify a restaurant, theater, or other <highlight>business</highlight>, but do so in the most striking way possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些霓虹灯牌的作用无非是标识一家餐厅、剧院、或是其他商铺，但它却以最引人注目的方式发挥着自己的作用。

examination_example.sentence: This is a family <highlight>business</highlight> started by my grandfather in 1950.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我祖父于1950年创办的家族企业。

examination_example.sentence: While 53% believe men will continue to hold more top executive positions in <highlight>business</highlight> in the future, 44% say it's only a matter of time before as many women are in top executive positions as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然53%的人认为未来男性将继续在企业中担任更多的高层管理职位，但44%的人表示，女性与男性高管数量齐平只是时间问题。

examination_example.sentence: Changing building codes, evolving tastes, and the high cost of maintaining those wonderful old signs have <highlight>businesses</highlight> embracing LEDs, which are energy efficient, but still carry great cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不断变化的建筑规范、人们越来越高的品味、再加上维护这些色彩缤纷但又老旧的标牌的高昂成本都促使企业开始接受LED灯，虽然LED灯节省能源，但成本依然很高。

business基本义指某人为谋利的“日常工作”或“职业”，引申可表示“职责/事务”。
go to business 上班
none of one's business 不关某人的事

business现在多指不可数名词“商业/生意/贸易”，引申为可数名词“商店/商行”。
go into business 从商
in business 经商
business由busy和ness组合而成，等同于busy的抽象名词。
on business指“因事或因公出差”，也可说on a little business “因一件小事”，但不可说on a business。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 事业；职业；行业；交易；生意；商业；系列事件；表演；受欢迎的人；难题

examination_example.sentence: Summer Company provides students with hands-on <highlight>business</highlight> training and awards of up to $3, 000 to start and run their own summer <highlight>businesses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夏日公司为学生提供亲身实践的商业培训，并提供高达3000美元的奖金，让他们开始并经营自己的暑期生意。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of taking care of his <highlight>business</highlight>, John was often off exploring nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰经常出去探索大自然，而不是打理他的生意。

examination_example.sentence: "Almost every great love story and each big <highlight>business</highlight> deal begins with small talk, " he explains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他解释道：“几乎每一段伟大的爱情故事和每一笔大生意都是从闲聊开始的。”

examination_example.sentence: Instead, he hopes that his <highlight>business</highlight> will grow steadily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，他希望他的生意能稳定发展。

examination_example.sentence: At 21, I landed a job at a big insurance company out of my <highlight>business</highlight> degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 21岁时，我凭借商学学位在一家大型保险公司找到了一份工作。

examination_example.sentence: He'll be on a <highlight>business</highlight> trip for a week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他要出差一星期。

examination_example.sentence: Luckily, I met a very good teacher who encouraged me to take some math classes, <highlight>business</highlight> classes, and history classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，我遇到了一位非常好的老师，他鼓励我去上一些数学课、商务课和历史课。

examination_example.sentence: Whenever I heard of <highlight>businesses</highlight> using plastic, I'd send an email.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当我听说商家使用塑料，我就发一封电子邮件。

examination_example.sentence: I wanted to reach <highlight>businesses</highlight> too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我也想到企业去。

examination_example.sentence: None of your <highlight>business</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不关你的事！

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。

普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 职业; 事业; 行业

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 事业；职业；行业；交易；生意；商业；系列事件；表演；受欢迎的人；难题

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 营业时间；商务时间；商业时间
经营业务；经营生意；做生意

examination_example.sentence: She says that she'll have to close the restaurant unless <highlight>business</highlight> improves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说除非生意好转，否则她将不得不关闭这家餐馆。

examination_example.sentence: More people are speaking Chinese than English, and the need for <highlight>business</highlight> people who know Chinese is skyrocketing．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说中文的人比说英语的人多，对懂中文的商务人士的需求也在激增。

examination_example.sentence: Although <highlight>business</highlight> was slow at first, it soon got better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然一开始生意不景气，但很快就好转了。

examination_example.sentence: And sometimes we take career risks, such as leaving a job or starting a <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时我们会冒职业风险，比如离职或创业。

examination_example.sentence: I've had to close down my <highlight>business</highlight> now and I don't know what I'm going to do for money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我现在不得不关闭我的公司，我不知道要做什么来赚钱。

examination_example.sentence: People began depending on them more and more to run <highlight>businesses</highlight>, markets and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们开始越来越依赖他们来经营企业、市场等。

sense_info_list.zh: 职业; 事业; 行业

examination_example.sentence: He has gone out of the town on <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他已经出城出差了。

examination_example.sentence: Soon enough, people asked her to make clothes, and it turned into a full-time <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很快，人们请她做衣服，这就变成了一个全职的事业。

examination_example.sentence: Now, a similar technology, known as facial detection (探测), is entering a new field: the <highlight>business</highlight> of advertising (广告).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，一种被称为人脸检测的类似技术正在进入一个新的领域——广告行业。

examination_example.sentence: My parents have been away on <highlight>business</highlight>, so I cook by myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我父母出差了，所以我自己做饭。

examination_example.sentence: Where did Tim go on <highlight>business</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂姆去哪里出差了？

examination_example.sentence: Then Mother came in and said, "Father's been called away—on <highlight>business</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后妈妈进来说:“爸爸被叫走去出差。”

examination_example.sentence: It's none of your <highlight>business</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不关你的事。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

word_usage.usage: business由busy和ness组合而成，等同于busy的抽象名词。

business基本义指某人为谋利的“日常工作”或“职业”，引申可表示“职责/事务”。
go to business 上班
none of one's business 不关某人的事

business现在多指不可数名词“商业/生意/贸易”，引申为可数名词“商店/商行”。
go into business 从商
in business 经商
on business指“因事或因公出差”，也可说on a little business “因一件小事”，但不可说on a business。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指需要完成或讨论的重要事务，也指归某人管的事或某人持有某种看法的事情，也可指商事。
通常指关乎利益、命运等的紧要事务，需要考虑或处理的事。
普通用词，词义最为广泛，可指任何事实、事件、情况、行为等。
指包括售货、购货、换货在内的综合商业活动，方式可以是批发或零售。
普通用词，含义广。既可指某种具体的商业又可指广泛的贸易。
口语用词，指买卖双方经过交涉达成协议成交。
